pages.text: This spiral growing grass can be found on the surface of Jungles or other Hot and Wet Biomes.
pages.title: Feverweed Patches
Feverweed
pages.text: Consuming this inflicts Hunger II and Luck II for 15 seconds.
You can grow Feverweed by planting it on Grass or Dirt blocks and wait for it to spread slowly. It spreads similarly to a mushroom, but will spread regardless of light level
pages.title: Cultivating Feverweed
